anya-e0608n0:29_0: Paramaṃ maṅgalaṃ laddho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.13.
anya-e0608n0:35_0: Gihī sahāyako sāmī, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.16.
anya-e0608n0:46_0: Mahāvattā pavattā ca, atthassa ninnetā pabhū;
anya-e0608n0:47_0: Amatassa dātā viññū, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.22.
anya-e0608n0:48_0: Divā tapati ādicco, rattiṃ dippati candimā;
anya-e0608n0:49_0: Rattiṃdivaṃ tapi nātho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.23.
anya-e0608n0:50_0: Sannaddho khattiyo tapati, jhāyī tapati brāhmaṇo;
anya-e0608n0:51_0: Nirantaraṃ tapi nātho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.24.
anya-e0608n0:79_0: Natthi etādiso guru, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.38.
anya-e0608n0:167_0: Ādicco viya dīpesi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.82.
anya-e0608n0:175_0: Dukkhato bahū mocesi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.86.
anya-e0608n0:189_0: Mānaṃ māyañca maddesi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.93.
anya-e0608n0:209_0: Sabbassa cāgī virāgī, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.103.
anya-e0608n0:251_0: Jino ajini pāpimaṃ, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.124.
anya-e0608n0:285_0: Sabbesaṃ sabbaṃ bodhesi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.141.
anya-e0608n0:309_0: Bahuṃ iddhiṃ anuppatto, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.153.
anya-e0608n0:319_0: Paramaṃ sukhaṃ sampatto, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.158.
anya-e0608n0:327_0: Vedagū ca vedantagū, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.162.
anya-e0608n0:343_0: Santataṃ samaṇo sāmī, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.170.
anya-e0608n0:424_0: Nirāgo cāpi nikkopo, nicchuddho cāpi nimmado;
anya-e0608n0:425_0: Niddukkho cāpi nissoko, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.211.
anya-e0608n0:449_0: Niccapalo ca nillolo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.223.
anya-e0608n0:671_0: Dhāresi antimaṃ dehaṃ, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.334.
anya-e0608n0:675_0: Sabbathā mutto subhaddo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.336.
anya-e0608n0:729_0: Sabbattha saṃvuto sāmī, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.363.
anya-e0608n0:775_0: Patto sabbaññutaṃ ñāṇaṃ, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.386.
anya-e0608n0:777_0: Paramaṃ sukhaṃ sampatto, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.387.
anya-e0608n0:805_0: Sududdasaṃ sivaṃ laddho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.401.
anya-e0608n0:817_0: Paramaṃ avayaṃ laddho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.407.
anya-e0608n0:843_0: Pūjanaṃ thomanaṃ laddho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.420.
anya-e0608n0:856_0: Sukhassa kovido cāpi, dukkhassa cāpi kovido;
anya-e0608n0:867_0: Sabbaso bhavaṃ bhañjesi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.432.
anya-e0608n0:879_0: Loke ālokaṃ jotesi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.438.
anya-e0608n0:915_0: Sabbathā akkhayaṃ patto, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.456.
anya-e0608n0:925_0: Sabbadhi sumano santo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.461.
anya-e0608n0:928_0: Tīrassa kovido cāpi, pārassa cāpi kovido;
anya-e0608n0:929_0: Ghoraṃ oghaṃ pāraṅgato, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.463.
anya-e0608n0:931_0: Sabbathā sabbaṃ bodhesi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.464.
anya-e0608n0:932_0: Yogassa kovido cāpi, khemassa cāpi kovido;
anya-e0608n0:993_0: Paraṃ sukhaṃ adhippatto, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.495.
anya-e0608n0:1132_0: Ākāso viya paññāya, alitto anilo yathā;
anya-e0608n0:1133_0: Anissito vihāsi yo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.565.
anya-e0608n0:1139_0: Assāsesi yathā cando, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.568.
anya-e0608n0:1141_0: Abhīruko yo acchambhī, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.569.
anya-e0608n0:1168_0: Asaṅgacitto akleso, āsā yassa na vijjati;
anya-e0608n0:1173_0: Anupādā vimutto yo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.585.
anya-e0608n0:1177_0: Appaneho ca appiho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.587.
anya-e0608n0:1201_0: Akukkucco ca akaṅkhī, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.599.
anya-e0608n0:1250_0: Dhammiṭṭho cāpi dhammaṭṭho, paññiṭṭho cāpi paññaṭṭho;
anya-e0608n0:1251_0: Suddhiṭṭho cāpi suddhaṭṭho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.624.
anya-e0608n0:1271_0: Asamo yo asadiso, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.634.
anya-e0608n0:1335_0: Sabbattha vimalo suddho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.666.
anya-e0608n0:1341_0: Sabbapāpaṃ pahāsi yo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.669.
anya-e0608n0:1355_0: Sabbato bhaddaṃ dassāvī, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.676.
anya-e0608n0:1357_0: Sabbesu ca nirākaṅkho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.677.
anya-e0608n0:1359_0: Nillobho api nillolo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.678.
anya-e0608n0:1361_0: Nippapañco ca nicchalo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.679.
anya-e0608n0:1369_0: Sabbataṇhā pahāsi yo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.683.
anya-e0608n0:1411_0: Paññakkho cāpi medhakkho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.704.
anya-e0608n0:1429_0: Dhammiṃ dhammaṃ vitthāresi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.713.
anya-e0608n0:1443_0: Dassesi amataṃ dhammaṃ, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.720.
anya-e0608n0:1551_0: Sabbaṃ sammā abhaññāsi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.774.
anya-e0608n0:1581_0: Sabbattha saṃvuto sūro, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.789.
anya-e0608n0:1599_0: Subhago sabbathā suddho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.798.
anya-e0608n0:1621_0: Yo amatapphalaṃ patto, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.809.
anya-e0608n0:1623_0: Paramaṃ sivaṃ sampatto, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.810.
anya-e0608n0:1625_0: Puṇṇindu viya sampuṇṇo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.811.
anya-e0608n0:1637_0: Nibbānaṃ yo sacchikato, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.817.
anya-e0608n0:1639_0: Sabbattha samako sāmī, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.818.
anya-e0608n0:1649_0: Sabbāsave pahāsi yo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.823.
anya-e0608n0:1656_0: Yo na limpati kāmesu, āraggeriva sāsapo;
anya-e0608n0:1663_0: Pahātabbaṃ pahīnaṃ yo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.830.
anya-e0608n0:1665_0: Bahū satte pamocesi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.831.
anya-e0608n0:1675_0: Brāhmaṇo samaṇo sādhu, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.836.
anya-e0608n0:1682_0: Yassa māyā ca māno ca, moho makkho ca pātito;
anya-e0608n0:1685_0: Asatto sugato nātho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.841.
anya-e0608n0:1690_0: Tapassī cāpi tejassī, yasassī ca yasodharo;
anya-e0608n0:1691_0: Vipassī cāpi vidassī, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.844.
anya-e0608n0:1693_0: Mahāmuni mahesī ca, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.845.
anya-e0608n0:1721_0: Paramaṃ padaṃ sampatto, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.859.
anya-e0608n0:1735_0: Asatto sugato suddho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.866.
anya-e0608n0:1746_0: Tejassī ca tejadhano, tapassī ca tapodhano;
anya-e0608n0:1747_0: Ñāṇesī ca ñāṇadhano, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.872.
anya-e0608n0:1757_0: Sabbā kaṅkhā vinodesi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.877.
anya-e0608n0:1758_0: Sabbā kaṅkhāyo vāpesi, ātāpī jhāyī brāhmaṇo;
anya-e0608n0:1759_0: Paccayānaṃ khayaṃ vidvā, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.878.
anya-e0608n0:1783_0: Sabbavidhe yato yati, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.890.
anya-e0608n0:1789_0: Accutaṃ akataṃ patto, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.893.
anya-e0608n0:1791_0: Buddho bodhiṃ pakāsesi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.894.
anya-e0608n0:1792_0: Paṇīto ca punīto ca, pavitto cāpi pāvano;
anya-e0608n0:1793_0: Pesalo pavaro mejjho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.895.
anya-e0608n0:1819_0: Bhavasotaṃ tiṇṇo nātho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.908.
anya-e0608n0:1831_0: Janānaṃ nandako bhiyyo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.914.
anya-e0608n0:1833_0: Kāmāsavaṃ pajahi yo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.915.
anya-e0608n0:1843_0: Nirodhaṃ sakkhiṃ akāsi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.920.
anya-e0608n0:1847_0: Sabbuttamaṃ dhammaṃ laddho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.922.
anya-e0608n0:1852_0: Sabbamohanisā hantvā, sabbaṃ rāgaṃ dosaṃ nudo;
anya-e0608n0:1897_0: Sabbadhi sumutto santo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.947.
anya-e0608n0:1915_0: Sabbe vattesi sabbaso, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.956.
anya-e0608n0:1936_0: Sabbattha kusalo satthā, sabbattha kovido vidū;
anya-e0608n0:1937_0: Sabbattha vimalo suddho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.967.
anya-e0608n0:1963_0: Sabbaṃ sotthiṃ sacchikato, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.980.
anya-e0608n0:1977_0: Sabbā icchā ucchedesi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.987.
anya-e0608n0:2087_0: Obhāsesi disā sabbā, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.1042.
anya-e0608n0:2203_0: Suddhaṃ saddhammaṃ dīpesi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.1100.
anya-e0608n0:2207_0: Santataṃ santiṃ pasāresi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.1102.
anya-e0608n0:2222_0: Bahū bhavoghā tāresi, sudakkho nāviko yathā;
anya-e0608n0:2237_0: Kalyāṇaṃ dhammaṃ desesi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.1117.
anya-e0608n0:2285_0: Sumukho sundaro eso, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.1141.
anya-e0608n0:2333_0: Bhassaro bhāsuro bhiyyo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.1165.
anya-e0608n0:2347_0: Pasiddho vissuto pujjo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.1172.
anya-e0608n0:2373_0: Sabbesaṃ seṭṭho dhammaṭṭho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.1185.
anya-e0608n0:2389_0: Yathābhūtaṃ vipassī ca, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.1193.
anya-e0608n0:2392_0: Sīlañca samādhiṃ patto, patto paññaṃ niyyānikaṃ;
anya-e0608n0:2411_0: Dhuvaṃ sassataṃ sampatto, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.1204.
anya-e0608n0:2412_0: Buddhimā mutimā ceva, matimā ca matissaro;
anya-e0608n0:2431_0: Nikkāmo nimmalo nātho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.1214.
anya-e0608n0:2432_0: Moneyyaseṭṭho munindo, ratiṃ ca aratiṃ cuto;
anya-e0608n0:2443_0: Uddharesi bahū satte, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.1220.
anya-e0608n0:2446_0: Dhañño nātho! Dhañño sāmī! Dhañño mārābhibhū munī!
anya-e0608n0:2449_0: Aho! Aho! Pāraṅgato, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.1223.
anya-e0608n0:2452_0: Aho! Buddho! Aho! Suddho! Aho! Saṃsuddhamānaso!
anya-e0608n0:2453_0: Aho! Aho! Mettāsindhu! Buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.1225.
